message.body: Are you busy tonight? I have two free tickets to the ben folds concert! I'm Singing backup. :)
What!!!!??? How are you singing backup? More info??
I was referred by a friend. :) it's at 8 at orchestra hall you'd just have to give them my name. Let me know asap
I want the tickets!!!! Me and kristyn will go together because tim has his first sermon tomorrow morning. Do you have any left?
Woo hoo!!!!!! Awesome!! You made my weekend!! Do i just say your name at the door then?
Will we have seats? Or will it be standing? I cant wait!! I am so happy for you!!
It's at orchestra hall so it'll be a big auditorium, no standing. :) yea it should be fun!
I love you and am excited!!!
Come to the stage door after it's around the corner from will call line. Maybe we could go out after?
Yeah!!! That sounds good. We will meet you after.
You should come out and dance if you ar not singing anymore!!!
